entry.title: hexo 主题优化
entry.content:
页脚元素居中 打开文件 Blog	hemes
ext\source\css\_schemes\Mist\index.styl 将 .footer-inner 中的 text-align: left; 修改为 text-align: center; 自定义细节 打开文件 themes/next/source/css/_custom/custom.styl 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566// 文章背景阴影效果 .post { margin-top: 60px; margin-bottom: 60px; padding: 25px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 203, .5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 204, .5); }// 代码块样式code { color: #ff9900; background: white; border-radius: 3px;}// 菜单栏.menu .menu-item a { font-size: 15px; color: #4a86e8; &:hover { background: Black; color: white;}}// footer背景透明.footer { background: transparent; font-size: 15px;}// header背景透明.header { background: transparent;}// 站点描述.site-description { color: #0593d3;}// 站点标题.site-title { color: #4a86e8; &:hover { color: Black;}}// 阅读全文.btn { color: #ff00ff;}// 友情链接.links-of-blogroll-title { color: #ff33cc;}// 文章内链接文本样式.post-body p a{ color: #4a86e8; border-bottom: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #4a86e8; &:hover { color: #ff9900; }} 隐藏底部信息栏 打开文件 themes/next/layout/_partials/footer.swig 1234567891011121314151617181920<!-- {% if theme.footer.powered.enable %} <div class="powered-by">{# #}{{ __('footer.powered', '<a class="theme-link" target="_blank"' + nofollow + ' href="https://hexo.io">Hexo</a>') }}{% if theme.footer.powered.version %} v{{ hexo_env('version') }}{% endif %}{# #}</div> {% endif %} {% if theme.footer.powered.enable and theme.footer.theme.enable %} <span class="post-meta-divider">|</span> {% endif %} {% if theme.footer.theme.enable %} <div class="theme-info">{# #}{{ __('footer.theme') }} &mdash; {# #}<a class="theme-link" target="_blank"{{ nofollow }} href="https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next">{# #}NexT.{{ theme.scheme }}{# #}</a>{% if theme.footer.theme.version %} v{{ version }}{% endif %}{# #}</div> {% endif %}--> 添加版权 打开文件夹 themes
ext\layout\_macro 新建文件 passage-end-tag.swig 添加如下代码 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627<div style="width:100%;padding-top:30px;padding-bottom:30px;"> {% if not is_index %} <div style="float:left;width:14%;text-align:center;color: #c4c4c4;font-size:14px;">--------------- </div> <div style="float:left;width:20%;text-align:center;color: #FFA07A;font-size:14px;">This article has ended</div> <div style="float:left;width:14%;text-align:center;color: #c4c4c4;font-size:14px;"> -------------</div> <div style="float:left;width:4%;text-align:center;color: red;font-size:14px;"><i class="fa fa-heart"></i></div> <div style="float:left;width:14%;text-align:center;color: #c4c4c4;font-size:14px;">-------------- </div> <div style="float:left;width:20%;text-align:center;color: #FFA07A;font-size:14px;">Thank you for reading</div> <div style="float:left;width:14%;text-align:center;color: #c4c4c4;font-size:14px;"> ---------------</div> {% endif %}</div><div style="margin-left:50px;padding-top:30px;padding-bottom:30px;"> <style type="text/css"> a:link {color: #0593d3} /* 未访问的链接 */ a:visited {color: #0593d3} /* 已访问的链接 */ a:hover {color: #0593d3} /* 鼠标移动到链接上 */ a:active {color: #0593d3} /* 选定的链接 */ </style> {% if not is_index %} <div style="float:left;text-align:center;font-size:14px;}">本文作者: <a href="https://keung.asia"}>KeiSzeto</a></div><br /> <div style="float:left;text-align:center;font-size:14px;">本文链接: <a href="{{ url_for(page.path) }}">{{ page.permalink }}</a></div><br /> <div style="float:left;text-align:center;font-size:14px;">许可协议: 本博客所有文章均采用 <a href="https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/">CC BY 4.0</a> 许可协议. 转载请注明出处!</div> {% endif %}</div> 打开文件 themes
ext\layout\_macro\post.swig ,在 post-body 与 post-footer 之间添加如下代码 12345<div> {% if not is_index %} {% include 'passage-end-tag.swig' %} {% endif %}</div> 打开主题配置文件，添加如下代码 123# 添加版权passage_end_tag: enabled: true 网页底部图标 打开文件 themes/next/layout/_partials/footer.swig 修改图标并换颜色 123<span class="with-love" id="animate" style="color: Black"> <i class="fa fa-heart"></i></span> 在 图标库 中找到喜欢的复制名称替换 heart 即可. 注脚 打开Blog右键 Git Bash 输入如下命令 npm un hexo-renderer-marked --save npm i hexo-renderer-markdown-it-plus --save npm install markdown-it-footnote --save 打开站点配置文件 [1]，添加如下代码 123456# 注脚markdown_it_plus: plugins: - plugin: name: markdown-it-footnote enable: true 阅读全文 颜色在自定义中修改 打开文件 themes>next>source>css>_schemes>Mist>_posts-expanded.styl 找到 .post-button ,将 text-align: left; 设为 center 删掉 a 标签中的 border-bottom 和 border 字段，添加如下代码 123border-style: dashed;border-width: 1px;padding: 6; 首页文章预览标题居中 打开文件 themes>next>source>css>_variables>Mist.style 将 $site-meta-text-align = left 设为 center 参考文章 1.Blog>_config.yml ↩

entry.title: Hexo + Next + Github + Custom Domain
entry.content: 准备工作 git：git官网 nodejs：nodejs官网 GitHub：GitHub官网 DNSPod：DNSPod官网 域名：Namecheap官网 安装过程 安装nodejs和git 调出控制台输入以下命令 12345678C:\Users\Kei.S>git --versiongit version 2.17.0.windows.1C:\Users\Kei.S>node -vv8.11.2C:\Users\Kei.S>npm -v5.6.0 安装成功 安装hexo：运行 Git Bash 输入 npm install hexo-cli -g 在合适的位置新建一个文件夹名为 Blog 用于存放博客，打开Blog右键运行 Git Bash 输入 npm install 然后输入 hexo s ，在浏览器中输入 http://localhost:4000/ 就可以看到效果了 配置过程 登陆DNSPod，添加域名绑定，成功后进入域名管理，复制两条记录类型为 NS的记录值。 登陆namecheap，查看你买的域名，点击右侧 MANAGE ，NAMESERVERS 选择 Custom DNS, 添加两条上面复制的记录值，保存。 登陆GitHub，新建仓库名为 username.github.io ，其中 username 一定要为GitHub用户名。在新建仓库根目录新建一个文件 CNAME ，里面填上你购买的域名，保存。 再次登陆DNSPod，在域名解析界面选择你的域名添加两条记录 主机记录 @ 记录类型 CANME 记录值 username.github.io 主机记录 www 记录类型 CANME 记录值 username.github.io 保存。 生成SSH key 查看是否有文件 C盘>用户>用户名>.ssh>id_rsa.pub ，如果没有 则运行 Git Bash ，输入以下命令 12ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail"ssh -T git@github.com 打开 id_rsa.pub 文件，复制里面内容,登陆GitHub点击 设置 > SSH and GPG keys> New SSH key 把复制的内容添加到 Key 保存。 运行 Git Bash 输入以下命令 123git config --global user.name "username" #GitHub用户名 git config --global user.email "useremail" #GitHub注册邮箱git config --list #查看 打开站点配置文件 [1]，修改 1234deploy: type: git repo: git@github.com:username/username.github.io.git #username是你的用户名 branch: master 打开Blog右键运行 Git Bash 输入以下命令 hexo g ,hexo d ,打开浏览器输入域名或者仓库名就能进入到你的博客了 至此大功告成！！！ 主题安装 打开Blog右键运行 Git Bash 输入以下命令 1git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next 成功后，打开站点配置文件 [1]， 找到 theme 字段，并将其值更改为 next 1theme: next #注意冒号后边有空格 打开主题配置文件 [2],可以自由切换 next 的四种主题 12345# Schemes#scheme: Musescheme: Mist#scheme: Pisces#scheme: Gemini 创建分类页面 打开Blog右键运行 “Git Bash”,输入 hexo new page categories 打开新建的文件夹 categories ,编辑 index.md ,添加 type: "categories" 注意：开启评论后，默认分类页面会带有评论，所以需要添加 comments: false 。 编辑主题配置文件 [2]，去掉 menu 中 categories 的注释 123menu: tags: /tags/ || tags categories: /categories/ || th tags 页面同上 站点地图 打开Blog右键运行 Git Bash 输入以下命令 npm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save 打开站点配置文件 [1]，末尾添加 12sitemap: path: sitemap.xml 在文件夹 source 中新建文件 robots.txt ，添加内容如下 12345678910111213User-agent: *Allow: /categories/Allow: /tags/Allow: /archives/Allow: /title/Disallow: /vendors/Disallow: /js/Disallow: /css/Disallow: /fonts/Disallow: /fancybox/Sitemap: https://你的域名/sitemap.xml Allow 为搜索引擎可爬取字段， Disallow 反之 根据主题配置文件 [2]中 menu 的设置，可自行删减字段 打开Blog右键运行 Git Bash ,然后 hexo clean , hexo g , hexo d 部署提交 进入 Google站长平台 添加域名 验证，选择 添加TXT记录，复制内容，登陆DNSPod，在域名解析添加一条记录 记录类型 TXT，记录值为上面复制的内容，保存 回到站长平台，进行 robots.txt测试工具 并测试，成功后 Google抓取工具 并请求编入索引 参考 Hexo中文文档 Next中文文档 主题用的图标 创建分类页面 网页播放器 主题个性化配置 sublime文本编辑器 markdown写博客 1.Blog>_config.yml ↩2.Blog>themes>next>_config.yml ↩

entry.title: Gabriel García Márquez
entry.content: One Hundred Years of SolitudePlot One Hundred Years of Solitude is the story of seven generations of the Buendía Family in the town of Macondo. The founding patriarch of Macondo, José Arcadio Buendía, and Úrsula Iguarán, his wife (and first cousin), leave Riohacha, Colombia, to find a better life and a new home. One night of their emigration journey, while camping on a riverbank, José Arcadio Buendía dreams of “Macondo”, a city of mirrors that reflected the world in and about it. Upon awakening, he decides to establish Macondo at the river side; after days of wandering the jungle, José Arcadio Buendía’s founding of Macondo is utopic. Founding patriarch José Arcadio Buendía believes Macondo to be surrounded by water, and from that island, he invents the world according to his perceptions.Soon after its foundation, Macondo becomes a town frequented by unusual and extraordinary events that involve the generations of the Buendía family, who are unable or unwilling to escape their periodic (mostly self-inflicted) misfortunes. For years the town is solitary and unconnected to the outside world with the exception of the annual visit of a band of gypsies, who show the townspeople technology such as magnets, telescopes and ice. The leader of the gypsies, Melquiades, maintains a close friendship with José Arcadio Buendía who becomes increasingly withdrawn, obsessed with investigating the mysteries of the universe presented to him by the gypsies. Ultimately he is driven insane, speaking only in Latin, and is tied to a chestnut tree by his family for many years until his death. Eventually Macondo becomes exposed to the outside world and the government of newly-independent Colombia. A rigged election between the Conservative and Liberal parties is held in the town, and this inspires Aureliano Buendía to join a civil war against the Conservative government. He becomes an iconic revolutionary leader, fighting for many years and surviving multiple attempts on his life, but ultimately becomes tired of war and signs a peace treaty with the Conservatives. Disillusioned, he returns to Macondo and spends the rest of his life making tiny goldfish out of gold in his workshop. The railroad is brought to Macondo, bringing in new technology and many foreign settlers. An American fruit company constructs a banana plantation outside the town and builds their own segregated village across the river. This ushers in a period of prosperity that ends in tragedy as thousands of striking plantation workers are massacred by the Colombian army, an incident based on the real life Banana massacre of 1928. José Arcadio Segundo, the only survivor of the massacre, finds no evidence of the massacre and the surviving townspeople refusing to believe that it happened. By the novel’s end Macondo has fallen into a decrepit and near-abandoned state, with the only remaining Buendías being Amaranta Úrsula and her nephew Aureliano. Aureliano’s parentage is hidden by his grandmother Fernanda, and he and Amaranta Úrsula enter an incestuous relationship unknowingly. They have a child who bears the tail of a pig, fulfilling the lifelong fear of the long-dead matriarch Úrsula. Amaranta Úrsula dies in childbirth and the child is devoured by ants, leaving Aureliano the last member of the family. He decodes an encryption left behind in a manuscript by Melquiades generations ago. The secret message informs the recipient of every fortune and misfortune lived by the Buendía family’s generations. As he reads the manuscript, a hurricane destroys all trace of Macondo’s existence. 本文摘选自 维基百科
